item.title: Cara Install Node Js Di Debian 11
item.author: Larry Marzan Jr.
item.description: Persiapan Sebelum Install Node Js Kita perlu mengupdate packages dan install curl 1 sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y curl Install Node Js Sesuai Pilihan Versi v14.x (Active LTS) v12.x (Maintenance LTS) v16.x (Latest Version) v14.x (LTS) 1 2 curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_14.x | sudo -E bash - sudo apt install -y nodejs v12.x (LTS) 1 2 curl -fsSL https://deb.
